data.text: @nz_clown @Iain06108010 @nzherald No one apart from me replies to your posts. Must be all the 💩 your talk
@nzherald I understood that the two ladies were being difficult and obstructing police when questioned. Have the facts now changed to suit the easy option?
@nzherald Good. She needs to be exposed as a moaner and a troublemaker
@nzherald Ever seen a dick?  Well heres one.
@nzherald It’s up to them to prove they didn’t do the thing he accused them of in the media Interesting take on justice there… https://t.co/BaVzBODdOZ

@Iain06108010 @nzherald Lol yeah don’t blame them I mean they were stupid rules and mandates anyway more mandates than pride day at one point. But the government shut them down not them people not covid.

@nzherald Holds an entire region at ransom in lockdown because they won’t cooperate with police causing at the very least, huge financial stress on businesses and yet there’s no evidence to charge… 🙄🙄
@nzherald But of course, the NZ sheeplings and test rats wouldn't mind it. 😆
